channel.title: varnish on Stitch-n-Glue
channel.description: Recent content in varnish on Stitch-n-Glue

item.title: 19. Outfitting
item.description: With four coats of varnish applied I’m moving on to outfitting the kayaks. It is time to install the hatches, seats and foot rests.

item.title: 18. Varnish, Sand, Varnish
item.description: This process is exciting! It is so rewarding to see the beauty of the wood grain revealed by this quality wood finish.
